sentences.en: Although this recipe looks long, it is actually very quick to prepare.
sentences.cn: 尽管这个菜谱看上去很长，其实做起来很快。

sentences.en: Beware, this recipe is not for slimmers.
sentences.cn: 注意，本食谱不适用于减肥者。

sentences.en: Each recipe specifies the size of egg to be used.
sentences.cn: 每种菜谱都具体规定了所用鸡蛋的大小。

sentences.en: I've got a good recipe for fudge.
sentences.cn: 我有一套做奶油软糖的好方法.

sentences.en: It's best not to try a new recipe for the first time on such an important occasion.
sentences.cn: 在这么重要的场合最好不要尝试以前从未做过的新菜谱。

sentences.en: Large-scale inflation is a recipe for disaster.
sentences.cn: 大规模的通货膨胀有可能导致灾难。

sentences.en: No two chefs follow the same recipe.
sentences.cn: 每个厨师都有不同的烹饪方式。

sentences.en: That's a sure recipe for destroying the economy and creating chaos.
sentences.cn: 那样做肯定会破坏经济、制造混乱。

sentences.en: The following recipe is a statement of another kind—food is fun!
sentences.cn: 下面的食谱是另一种观点的表现——食物可以带来乐趣！

sentences.en: The recipe calls for oodles of melted chocolate.
sentences.cn: 这道食谱要用上大量熔好的巧克力。

sentences.en: The recipe for making the liqueur has been handed down from generation to generation.
sentences.cn: 这种酿酒方法世代相传.

sentences.en: The recipe for their drink is a closely guarded trade secret.
sentences.cn: 他们饮料的配方是严格保守的商业秘密。

sentences.en: This recipe is foolproof—it works every time.
sentences.cn: 这个食谱绝对管用，每次都万无一失。

sentences.en: This recipe makes a good accompaniment to ice-cream.
sentences.cn: 这道食谱适合搭配冰激凌。

sentences.en: This recipe will be enough for four servings.

trans.tran_en: a set of instructions for cooking a particular type of food
